content.html: 3/ I’m sorry if this upsets my landlord friends, but I am beginning to feel what you do should be taxed so heavily it’s untenable as an industry. i’m fine with someone having one property. Maybe two. But we have to get back to basics and understand these are not investments.
content.value:
3/ I’m sorry if this upsets my landlord friends, but I am beginning to feel what you do should be taxed so heavily it’s untenable as an industry. 

i’m fine with someone having one property. Maybe two. But we have to get back to basics and understand these are not investments.
